channel.title: pico-8 on Jeff Glass
channel.description: Recent content in pico-8 on Jeff Glass

item.title: PICO-8: Orbit
item.description: Over the past couple weeks, as a way to stretch my programming legs and play around with a new system, I've been writing a little demo in the 8-bit retro video game environment called PICO-8. Since I think I'm drifting away from this project now, I figured I might as well post my progress here: a "game" demo called Orbit that instantiates a number of objects moving in an elliptical orbit around a central planet.
